skins.shipDescription: First ship of the Shouhou-class aircraft carriers, Shouhou.
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Shouhou, first ship o' the Shouhou-class! The luck's a bit poor, but they ain't a thing I can do 'bout that.
skins.acquisition: Commander, Shouhou's the name. I don't have a lotta firepower or planes like those regular carriers, but there's plenty o' stuff I can do that they can't! A real pleasure to meet ya!
skins.login: I'll protect ya even if it means puttin' my own life at risk, Commander!
skins.details: Ahh~ the folks always tell me, I'm gonna be a real beauty when I grow up~
skins.secretaryIdle1: Ah, Commander, I'm ready to give it my all t'day as well! Let's go stick it to those bad guys!
skins.secretaryIdle2: My big sis and Kaga are always lookin' after me, but one day, I wanna be more independent!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, the weather's real swell today! What's with the gloomy mug? Let's play together!
skins.secretaryTouch: I don't really mind, but you shouldn't be doin' that to others.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Nnh... Stuff like this... is better saved for night~

skins.shipDescription: Commander, how do I look now that I've grown up? Are ya fallin' in love with me already? Mhm, ye definitely are~
skins.acquisition: Commander, how do I look now that I've grown up? Are ya fallin' in love with me already? Mhm, ye definitely are~
skins.details: Don't look so sad... I'll keep growing. I'm sure of it!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, gimme a chance to prove myself!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Why does everyone treat me like a kid when I'm already all grown up?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Grown-ups need to play, too! Won't you play with me, Com~man~der?
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, do ye like my Shikigami? They ain't the bitin' type, I swear!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: I feel like I've definitely matured some! Commander, what do ya think?
